entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 12. POP 30%
